forum.name: progress of a hobbo

forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: progress on 'thousand loop plate'

comments.text: most of the physical structure has been done. plan to add electric effect with shapes, plan to add rotating plate to phase through ring.
